name: Academy of Champions: Soccer
description:
Brightfield Academy is every young soccer star’s dreamland featuring wild and beautiful environments, over-the-top animations, “out of this world” visual effects and hilarious characters to interact with every single day.

So pack your bags – it’s time to enroll yourself into a curriculum of outrageous matches, insane training drills and nonstop fun at the Academy of Champions.

Special Features

• Wii Balance Board
• Compatible with Wii MotionPlus
